INVALID.message: The photo has been classified as invalid, no analysis performed.

JUST_CREATED.message: The photo has been successfully saved, Snowwatch is starting the processing

NO_GPS.message: Unable to perform the alignment: Unable to automatically find the GPS coordinates. Please manually provide the GPS coordinates.

NO_FOV.message: Unable to compute the fov, please align manually.

WAITING_ALIGNMENT.message: Snowwatch is performing the alignment, please wait, or align manually.

NO_ALIGNMENT.message: Snowwatch couldnt align the photo, please align manually.

ALIGNED.message: Snowwatch found an alignment, have a look.

steps_ROMAN_IGNORA_QUESTA_PARTE: calcola il fov partendo dagli exif e dettagli modello amcchina
calcola il render con le coordinate e il fov
